changelogversion.changelogtext: Fixed AOSP translations in Dialer, Fwb, DeskClock and a few other repos
Add Pixel button animation
Make ringtone audio focus customizable
Expose values under Calendars to display fragment for themes
Add IME Switcher icon back into the statusbar
Add configurable IME Switcher
Fix RTL layout with membar 'free ram' text
Fix quickbar tile gap with less than 6 tiles
Update contacts static shortcut
Disable the RTC wakeup timer
Allow to set Ripple on other buttons for Home button only pixel animation
Expose Keyguard affordance circle background
Add support for Phh Superuser to dashboard
PA solid circle battery style
Add few more steps to battery saver trigger values
Hide bottom shortcuts
Add button backlight settings for certain devices
Change color scheme for Messaging, OmniSwitch, Calendar and Gallery
Removed launcher3 settings
Fix clang warnings and leak of full_stats_file
Fix memory leak of dirbuf
Fix clang static analyzer warnings
Hide Lockscreen emergency button
Fix gap issue with keyguard clock/carrier label
Introduce our new DU About app
Add DU About to Settings
Make use of BaseSystemSettingSwitchBar for our clock fragment
Make 'solid' battery the same size as the circle
Add longpress action for data saver and heads up QS tiles
Change long click actions on some QS tiles
Fix static analyzer warnings
Fix potential overflows
Fix static analyzer warnings
All tile scroller for quickbar settings
Auto calculate quickbar tiles amount
Increase Zenmode max hour limit from 12 to 24
Add optional findContrastColor algorithm for dark backgrounds
Status bar notification ticker
New DU Updater vector in Settings and QS tile
Add 'new message' messaging shortcut using the API introduced in sdk25
Separate one handed mode icons
Add missing string to volume panel
Lots of translations
Fix a use-of-uninitialized-value warning.
Disable touch slop for generated gesture events
Longpress DND QS tile when active to show detail view
Add a Heads Up fragment
Improve Heads up toggle
Add timeout option for Heads up
Fix typo "%%" battery saver
Correct spelling/grammar in Settings/Dirty Tweaks
Add One-hand UI mode
Add DUI integration for One-hand UI mode
Fix one handed mode triggering tapjacking protection
Replace colorpicker action set png with vector
Remove Data Saver QS tile dialog
Update change log layout
Increase brightness faster if ambient light is brightening quickly
Update empty heads up layout
Add lockscreen items category
Add option to hide lockscreen clock, date, and alarm text
Reorganize Tethering/Nfc options
Power menu dialogs improvements
Update empty Extended desktop layout
Revert "Add text shadow for text in qs header"
ADB "N" icon compatible with OMS7
Set external settings icon tint mode to SRC_ATOP
Remove Chromium
Add device specific gestures to DU-Tweaks for certain devices
Frequently used OpenGL ES methods whitelisted for fast JNI path
Fix NPE causing a hot reboot when pressing power button
Revert back to previous configuration for xxxhdpi-3072-dalvik-heap
Added advanced location QS tile
Added 'Less notifications sound' mod
Added dashboard configuration mods
Make QS smart ambient-LiftToWake tile compatible with all devices
Fix wrong algorithm in WifiPowerPerPacket()
Fix crash with HWC2
Fix IndexOutOfBoundsException in AccessibilityManagerService
Fix for reboot due to Volume State not updated in callback
Fix finding hardware codec (stagefright)
Fix crash for overflow in LiveSession
Fix two same BT devices are shown
Added text shadow for text in qs header
Update qs settings on dpi change
Fix playing screenshot's sound when camera's sounds off
Fix Access to field 'targets' results in a dereference of a null pointer
Fix Potential leak of memory pointed to by 'sourcesLiteral'
Avoid crash for stss sync sample number 0
Fix Potential leak of memory pointed to by 'sourcesLiteral'
Fix clipping for edit screen of Quick Settings
Fix a use-of-uninitialized-value warning
Fix InCallActivity onStop call when launch from Lockscreen
Fix visibility of single-line view in expanded group notification
Fix guts not expanding when QSPanel is expanded
Changes to the OmniStyle header image
Make DU Updater theme friendly
Add Smart Ambient-LiftToWake QS tile
Restore user night light brightness values also after reboot
Fix navbar edit non-protected broadcast logspam
Allow grayscale even if invert boolean is false
Don't cut off brightness slider and button (headers)
Fix OmniSwitch non-protected broadcast logspam
Immediately adjust hideSensitivity of Notifications
Fix gear not showing when rotation or RTL changed
Account for time changes when showing recent activities
Add membar to recents options
Fix white flash when launching Tuner activities
Fix issue when start android/com.android.internal.backup.LocalTransportService
Fix 'Deep sleep' issue on certain devices
Fix DU Updater issues on certain devices
Update SuperSU to 2.79-SR3
Remove SU system dingleberry
Let's get to choose keyboard again in Settings.
Fix crash with ChooseLockGeneric
Fix the momery leak in DrawOverlayDetails
Fix crash while searching in Settings
Fix default Home preference FC on orientation change
Fix FAB not disappearing in multiwindow
Unify the DatePicker Dialog and MIN_DATE
Add HotwordEnrollment APK for certain devices
Fix rare SystemUI FC while changing density in settings
Add Nfc QS Tile
Fix QuickQS visibility at non-first page
Make sure that fingerprint daemon.cancelAuthentication() only execute once
Fix NullPointerException in MediaPlayer
FAB Recents Clear All
FAB Recents Clear All improvements
Add Camera sound toggle for Camera2 only
Add googles updated backup transfer service
CallLogActivity re-created when rotating device
Expedite the processing of destroying Incall UI after end call
Fix conference call duration issue
Fix display of floating action button
Parse "vendor/priv-app" to find privileged applications
Pass correct permissions arguments
Expose switch bar title for themers
Use vectorized arrow icons for network traffic
Don't crash for too long baseband version
Allow faster app switching
Expose dashboard category padding bottom for themers
Expose switchbar background color for themers
Fix translations for crowdin
Expose manifest styles for themers
Double tap to sleep on the statusbar
Double tap to sleep anywhere on the lock screen
Battery icon improvements
Make Power Notification Controls scrollable
Fix possible bootloop with PackageManagerService
Use simple 'set wallapper' chooser with Launcher3
Custom QS header images
Custom QS header extensions
Custom QS header dpi change behaviour
Montée d'Android en version 7.1.1_r13 / Correctif de sécurité Android du 5 Janvier 2017
Ajout des Paramètres dans DU Updater
Corrections du code de DU Updater
Exposition des couleurs des icônes de paramètres externes dans Paramètres
Améliorations du mode Éclairage nocturne
Add titles in DU Updater to each fragment/shortcut
Expose QS battery for themers
Fix NPE on boot with DU Updater
A lot of surfaceflinger fixes
Use a vector for DU Updater shortcuts
Enable Storage Manager
Fix developer options with MultiROM
Sepolicy fixes
Kill off log spam from SuperSU, runtime exception
Fix incorrect webview signatures
Add a proper landscape layout for colorpicker
Fix battery text gap issue
DU Updater layout changes / Add 'hide app icon' option
Added static shortcuts introduced in API 25 to DU Updater
Remove secure keyguard condition on hiding the advanced reboot option
Add our updater to the dashboard
Fix empty carrier label options on msim devices
Remove text from actionbar / Use overflow menu in 'Running Services'
Enable three icon switching within QS DND tile
Fix race condition in accessibility
Allow closing empty view via tapping in Recents
Fix duplicate broadcast receiver in OmniSwitch
Add OmniSwitch toggle to protected broadcasts
Fix potential NULL dereference
Fix audio for WifiDisplay
Fix getDrawable for new Android API for battery icon
Prevent potential SysUI fc if no valid battery res
Show battery custom charging symbol near pct in the keyguard too
Don't show battery bolt when using charging symbol near percentage text is enabled
